did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Nelson C. Nye manuscripts, 1941-1988
did.abstract: This is a collection of 24 published manuscripts with holograph corrections, chiefly published in the 1960s.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Nelson C. Nye papers (AZ 332). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Nelson C. Nye was a Western writer originally from Chicago, Illinois. He worked as a ranch hand in Texas before owning a horse ranch in New Mexico. He studied under authors Laurence D'Orsay and Arthur Sullivant and wrote numerous Westerns under his own name and pseudonyms Drake Denver and Clem Colt. In addition, Nye was one of the founders and twice served as president of Western Writers of America.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of 24 published manuscripts with holograph corrections, chiefly published in the 1960s

did.unittitle: Undated manuscript of Complete Book of the Quarter Horse. Published by A. S. Barnes, New York, 1964. No date
Undated manuscript of Champions of the Quarter Tracks. Published by Coward-McCann, New York, 1950. No date
Undated manuscript of Curly Bill Story. Published as The Seven Six-Gunners by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1963. No date

scopecontent.p: Published in England by Collins as Death Comes Riding, 1962.

did.unittitle: Undated manuscript of The Irreverent Scout. Published by Mills & Boon, Inc., England, 1961. No date

scopecontent.p: Published as Frontier Scout by Vega Books, Inc., New York, 1964.

did.unittitle: Undated manuscript of Pistols for Hire. Published by Macmillan, New York, 1941. No date

scopecontent.p: Later published as A Bullet for Billy the Kid.

did.unittitle: Undated manuscript of Treasure Trail from Tucson. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1964 in volume with Sudden Country. No date
Undated manuscript of Trail of Lost Skulls. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1967. No date
Undated manuscript of Ambush at Yuma's Chimney. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1965. No date
Undated manuscript of Gun Feud at Tiedown. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1965. No date
Undated manuscript of A Lost Mine Named Salvation. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1968. No date
Undated manuscript of Not Grass Alone. Published by Macmillan, New York, 1961. No date
Undated manuscript of Rider on the Roan. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1967. No date
Undated manuscript of Iron Hand. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1966. No date
Undated manuscript of The Marshall of Pioche. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1966. No date
Undated manuscript of Rogue's Rendezvous. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1965. No date
Undated manuscript of Single Action. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1967. No date
Undated manuscript of Sudden Country. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1964. No date
Undated manuscript of Wolftrap. Published by Ace Books, Inc., New York, 1969. No date
Undated manuscript of Trigger Talk. Published by Phoenix Press, 1942. No date
Undated manuscript of Gringo. Published by Ace Books, 1969. No date
Undated manuscript of Trouble at Pena Blanca. Published by Avon Books, 1969. No date
Undated manuscript of Hellhound for Ballarat. Published by Ace Books, 1970. No date
Readers proofs of Mule Man. Published by Doubleday, 1988. No date

scopecontent.p: Includes a carbon copy of the original typescript.

did.unittitle: Undated manuscript of No Place to Hide Published by Paper Jacks, 1988. No date

scopecontent.p: Originally titled Heir to Bullybueno. Includes pages 1-113 of the original typescript and photocopies of pages 114-169.
